description:
This traditional feng shui class gives you the exact instructions for creating the most successful arrangement of each of the nine areas in your home, office or bedroom. Known as Xuan Kong Fei Xing, or Flying Stars Feng Shui, this ancient discipline is based on the natural elements and the constantly changing energies on our planet. Learning and applying this information can make huge improvements in your life, and it's so simple and fun to do.

You don't need any special Chinese decorations or tools, just an everyday compass. Even the compass app on your phone is enough to put this information into action today using everyday objects that are around you right now. Be warned: Feng Shui is so fun and effective you could get hooked on it for life!
title: Feng Shui for the Chinese New Year: Fire Monkey 2016-2017
